snippet: In a letter to Congress, the organization argues that the Internet Radio Fairness Act, a federal bill supported by Pandora and Clear Channel, would deprive artists of fair pay for their work.
abstract: In a letter to Congress, the organization argues that the Internet Radio Fairness Act, a federal bill supported by Pandora and Clear Channel, would deprive artists of fair pay for their work.

headline.main: N.A.A.C.P. Opposes Effort to Change Online Royalties

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
